definition: to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous
the past is vanished like the wind; gone beyond recall

sentences.english: Then when you get older and think back, you’ll be able to enjoy it a second time.
sentences.chinese: 当你年老回首往事时，便能再次享受你的一生。

sentences.english: The scene awakens reminiscences of my youth.
sentences.chinese: 这景象唤起我年轻时的往事。

sentences.english: The events of the past who mentioned, once again, to forget you.
sentences.chinese: 这往事谁又曾提起，再一次，忘却你。

sentences.english: Yet, the drinks that burnt my throat became the story of our past, each in my mind, crystalized.
sentences.chinese: 但是入口的酒却变成往事，一一在我心头永恒。

sentences.english: The only shield to his memory is the rectitude and sincerity of his actions.
sentences.chinese: 在追忆往事时，唯一的盾牌是他的行为正直和诚实。

sentences.english: And I understand. But boy it's time to let go.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我的男孩，现在是让往事随风而去的时候了。

sentences.english: If the clouds chasing the moon, hears, to recall past events and people.
sentences.chinese: 若有那彩云追月，声声入耳，忆起往事和人。

sentences.english: This golden youth long since was past.
Please don't play that song, It has bad associations for me .
sentences.chinese: 请别放那首歌，那会勾起我的伤心往事。

sentences.english: Here has become martyrs Remembrance of the past later pondered the historical sites.
sentences.chinese: 这里已成为后人凭吊先烈追忆往事的历史遗址。

sentences.english: Recall the past, are you happy or not?
sentences.chinese: 回忆往事，你是快乐还是忧伤？

sentences.english: In such reminiscences the night was spent.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的追忆往事中度过了这个夜晚。

sentences.english: William did not share his brother's passion for reminiscence.
sentences.chinese: 威利并没有分享弟弟回忆往事的幽思。

sentences.english: It was past one by the time I got to Gerard’s.
sentences.chinese: 这是我去杰拉德家的一段往事。

sentences.english: Thousands of events in the past pours into my mind. By toasting the void, I lament the bygone heroes.
sentences.chinese: 数千年往事注到心头，把酒凌虚，叹滚滚英雄谁在？

sentences.english: For most of us, a stroll down Memory Lane is an easy trip.
sentences.chinese: 对于大多数人而言，追忆往事是一种简单的旅行。

definition: to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
the past/impurity contracted previously (in the sentient world) (Buddhism)
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
the past is vanished like the wind; gone beyond recall
to recall with emotion/to feel sentiments
